channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 27th October
item.description:
Road closure 3 months please refresh give way markings approximately 22 600x150mm dot's plus x7 600x100mm dot's plus 2 3 metres lines plus x1 3 metres triangle (Faded Road Markings)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Road Markings problem, 27th October
item.description:
Road closure 3 months please refresh give way markings approximately 24 600x150mm dot's plus x13 600x100mm dot's plus 2 3 metres lines plus x1 3 metres triangle (Faded Road Markings)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Kerbs and Channels problem, 27th October
item.description:
Give and take plus temporary footway closure required please repair x1 chipped kerb stone 200x100x45mm with concrete fillet (CW Edge Kerbing & Channels)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 27th October
item.description:
Please pass onto the relevant local ahr representative regarding unblocking of 1X blocked drain
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There is no street lighting at all in Hawthorn Road, 27th October
item.description:
There is no Street lighting at all in Hawthorn road and I'm pretty sure there's none in Tanners Road and at least the top half of Orchard Avenue (I can't see the bottom half so couldn't comment). It's been going on at least 10 days and doesn't seem to be getting fixed.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 15;17, Hawthorn Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandon car left that has been in accident, 27th October
item.description:
Its seems to be that a car that has been in an accident and has been abandon by the road site just in front of the entrance to Elmbridge Court estate. The car is dumped in a dangerous position and is causing a hazard to people using the road. Please note image
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmbridge Court, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 27th October
item.description:
Please cut back overgrown trees (x3) to safe. Tree overhanging CW. Please cut back to increase height on CW. Road closure (Overgrown Tree)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cracked paving stones, uneven, trip hazard, 27th October
item.description:
Between number 6 and number 22 Windsor Street (west side) many of the paving stones next to the curb are broken posing a serious trip hazard. An elderly gentleman had a fall last week which could have been really serious. The other problem is that the cracked paving stones hold rain water which will be an additional hazard during the winter.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 14, Windsor Street, Lynworth, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Graffiti on bus stop, 27th October
item.description:
Graffiti is on the Perspex making it hard to read the 15 timetable. Stop: Cheltenham opp Main Entrance

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairfield Parade, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
